actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Small Business
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to compliance loans.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to make loans to small businesses so that they may meet requirements of Federal law, State law, or regulation issued in compliance with Federal law without regard to the date when such requirements are imposed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to compliance loans.
